name: Edgar Castro
text: If you like frozen pizza. just go to your grocery store pizzas taste better trust me

name: Waseem Nemat
text: Very cozy place. You get to create your own pizza choosing toppings, sauces, even thickness. Price is very reasonable.  Pizza turned out to be very tasty. Mostly the thin pizza is the perfect choice, it is baked in a stone fire grill / pure ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyson Reyes
text: Good food, fast service, convenient location. There are good options and fair pricing. You can, like all these "build your own" pizza places, replace the traditional crust with two healthier options (for an additional cost). All in all a great place to eat and socialize.

name: David Piraino
text: This review is all about the customer experience. The team working tonight was upbeat and provided great service. Brian and Carlos on the line were particularly memorable. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Navratil
text: Build your own Pizza- awesome! My husband and daughter did a pizza w/ 2 toppings. I chose the Take 2. I got 1/2 pizza and salad. I got to pick my own toppings for both things. It was yummy and tons of food for us. Very clean and very friendly employees.

name: Krista Guillory
text: Yes! I love the subway of pizza. I also love how pizza has become so unique and personal to each persons tastes. Really cool that they cook it right there and it‚Äôs fresh out the oven when you eat it. Always clean inside. Kind staff.

name: Memo Rosls
text:
It's good, the guys there really enjoy what they do, my only concern is that the work prep table is always full of food debries and the oven has a lot of burnt stuff that sticks to the crust.
Other than that, it's a good place for pizza.

name: Swag Bunny
text: To start off, it's a nice place to relax wih your friends and eat. The pizza was pretty good and cheesy (just how I like it!), the crust was well-made, and the toppings were fresh. Also, the service there was excellent (patient and ‚Ä¶More

name: Gustavo Melchor
text: Really good pizza

name: Will
text: I've tried the rest Blaze is the best and let me tell you why! It's the ingredients people! The toppings have a more natural flavor than that from Pizza Press and Pieology. I'm not sure why, but when I design my pizza with the exact same ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Garcia
text: Great gluten free option and Keto friendly crusts. I tried the Cauliflower crust and it was nice and crispy. Great environment and awesome play list to go along with your lunch!

name: Jason Ng
text: Spacious seating, never too busy all the times we've been for lunch and dinner.

name: Ramon Cruz
text: it's the best pizza in town. Love to be in this place every weekend

name: Rinzler Gonzalez
text: Says they close at 10 pm I show up literally 8:50 on and they are cleaning yelling at me there closed... Bruh really üòÇ

name: Greyson Rose
text: I constantly arrive grabbing some food in this spot. I enjoyed the fast customer service and well prepared food. Keep up the good work.

name: K G
text: Blaze had quality ingredients and lots to choose from. They even have a high rise pizza crust, a Keto crust, and a Cauliflower crust.  Staff is friendly and the place is clean. It is in the same building as Coffee Bean and Coldstone so kind if a one stop shot for a great Saturday night!

name: Seth m
text: The food is good, but the respect for the customer is minimal. Trying to enjoy thier good food for lunch and the staff turns the radio music up full blast, without regards to the customer. Asked for it to be turned down and it was only ‚Ä¶More

name: Waseem Sandra
text: One of the yummiest pizzas I have ever had in California. Stone fire grilled and yummmmmy. You get to make your own mix for the pizza and the choices are really wide. Very clean and wide selection. Prices are reasonable and they offer wine and beer. I will go there again soon!

name: Rebecca Lemmon
text: Love building my own pizza. Beverage bar is cool. Blaze employees often struggle to remember the extra thing like dough-knots or a salad. I think it's a problem in their overall process, not the associates in particular.

name: Ana Camacho
text: Got there 30mins before they closed and still got good service. We ate inside and didn't feel rushed to leave. Although we did feel bad for keeping then and left right after a few slices.

name: Denise Cordero
text: Great service, delicious pizza.

name: Melissa Jordan
text: Disgusting bathroom, never the bathroom do not have a schedule of bathroom cleaning

name: Christian Fong
text: Clean, employees were nice, music was good

name: John Villagrana
text: Very good place for lunch fast service and it takes really good

name: Linda Vedel
text: Pick your own toppings on pizza place.lots of cheese was put on pizza. Good prices, good food. Employees were very friendly and restaurant was very clean. I will let everyone know about this place.

name: rich uriarte
text: Eddie is the man customer service is so great made me feel like I was ordering at home clearly a great team member and when my girlfriend ordered a vegan pizza he offered to change his gloves and made sure everything was set even üëå can't wait to return to this location and bring some friends

name: patrick zibell
text: Delicious pizza and great service

name: EDDIE GUERRERO
text: Our third time there and always impress.  Great pizza.  Now when I think of pizza Blaze comes to mind.

name: Jeff Rodas
text: Pepperoni, sausage, ham, don't forget the bacon, jalapenos and spicy red sauce of course. With lots of mozzarella all on top of it. Oh yeah baby, with a large Diet Coke refillable of course now that's the ticket. Please visit my website the ice Road King on YouTube thank you

name: Rob the Saxon
text: Love all the options here. A lot of their locations all have sticky tables...boo

name: James Shin
text: Love the fact that I make my own pizza at a reasonable price. First time customer and will definitely be going back!

name: Marika Elizabeth
text: Awesome has cauliflower dough and gluten free options good if your on a keto diet

name: Calikid Xpress
text: Love this place great staff and awesome pizza...if you like rootbeer you have to try the rootbeer amazing... staff even dealt really nice to a rude Arabic woman in front of me in line...they did a great job...I would have thrown her out of my store...

name: Emdee Liu
text: This review is strictly for Keto crust and mozzarella cheese they use. One word really..they are bad. Keto crust taste like an old compound paper that's about to fall apart from humidity. Try to ask for a well done crust and that might help ‚Ä¶More

But what made the difference here was the employee Gwen or Gwin, she had amazing recommendations and suggestions for what I should add to my pizza to get that wow factor. üòã Definitely pleased with her and my pizza üôåüèæ
